description.value:
The shaman receives a +4 bonus to her CMD when resisting bull rush or trip attempts as long as she is standing on the ground.

At 5th level, the shaman receives @Compendium[pf1.feats.gTrGPxzN054GfpkM]{Improved Trip} as a bonus feat.

At 10th level, the shaman receives @Compendium[pf1.feats.lNyMFFQaOxxTOW7M]{Greater Trip} as a bonus feat.

The shaman does not need to meet the prerequisites of these feats.
